title: T3 Trace Event
description: Trace event emitted by the TF runtime (one JSON object per line).

ts.description: Monotonic timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.

prim_id.description: Canonical primitive identifier or known alias.

args.description: Arguments passed to the primitive invocation.

region.description: Region path for the primitive (e.g., '/acct') or empty when unspecified.

effect.description: Effect name inferred for the primitive invocation.
